props.name: $slides
props.description: The slides selector, relative to the initialization container.

props.name: navigation
props.description: navigation object.

props.name: progress_bar
props.description: The progress bar object (TODO)

props.name: $buttons
props.description:
The button selector container relative to the initialization container. 
                                                                 The buttons should be present in the container, and have either one of the following class: first, previous, play, pause, resume, stop, next last. 
                                                                 If "<" is specified, then the initialization container will be used.

props.name: $pause_hover
props.description:
The selector, relative to the initialization container, which defines the elements to listen to trigger the break, on the "hover" event. 
                                                                 If "<" is specified, then the initialization container will be used.

props.name: $mask_buttons_hover
props.description:
The selector, relative to the initialization container, that defines the elements that triggers whether to display buttons, on the "hover" event. 
                                                                 The container of buttons must be different of the container of the slideshow.
                                                                 If "<" is specified, then the initialization container will be used.

props.name: $mask_nav_hover
props.description:
The selector, relative to the initialization container, that defines the elements that triggers whether to display the navigation container, on the "hover" event. 
                                                                 The parameter container of the navigation must be defined and must be different of the container of the slideshow.
                                                                 If "<" is specified, then the initialization container will be used.

props.name: mask_buttons_load
props.description:
Hide buttons during loading of a slide.
                                                                  The container of buttons must be different of the container of the slideshow.

props.name: mask_buttons_fx
props.description:
Hide buttons during transition of a slide.
                                                                  The container of buttons must be different of the container of the slideshow.

props.name: mask_nav_load
props.description:
Hide navigation container during transition of a slide.
                                                                  The parameter container of the navigation must be defined and must be different of the container of the slideshow.

props.name: mask_nav_fx
props.description:
Hide navigation container during transition of a slide.
                                                                  The parameter container of the navigation must be defined and must be different of the container of the slideshow.

props.name: await_nav_fx
props.description: Waiting for the end of a transition for draw the change of the navigation item.

props.name: await_load
props.description: Waiting for the end of a loading to be able to change slide.

props.name: await_fx
props.description: Waiting for the end of a transition to be able to change slide.

props.name: css_await_bt
props.description: Class of buttons that wait the end of a transition or a loading.

props.name: touch
props.description: Allow touch swipe events to control previous/next.

props.name: keyboard
props.description: Allow keyboard events to control previous/next.

props.name: css_disable_bt
props.description: Class of disabled buttons.

props.name: auto_play
props.description: Enable Autoplay.

props.name: delay
props.description: Time in milliseconds between each transition .

props.name: stop_event
props.description: Stop event propagation and default actions.

props.name: start_index
props.description: The start index.

props.name: fx
props.description: Transition slide object.

props.name: load
props.description: Loading slide function.

props.name: beforeWait
props.description: Custom method called  while awaiting a transition.

props.name: onCancel
props.description: Custom method called when a slide is cancelled.

props.name: onPlay
props.description: Custom method called when the playback start.

props.name: onPause
props.description: Custom method called when on pause.

props.name: onResume
props.description: Custom method called when the playback is resumed.

props.name: onStop
props.description: Custom method called when the player stops.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Custom method called when a slide is changed.

props.name: beforeDraw
props.description: Custom method called before a transition.

props.name: afterDraw
props.description: Custom method called adter a transition.

props.name: isLoaded
props.description: Check that a slide is loaded.
